short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Real-time cryptocurrency trades from multiple exchanges, providing live updates, volume-based alerts, and trade statistics.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Aggr Trade is a cryptocurrency market trades aggregator that provides live, real-time data from multiple exchanges. It aggregates trade information by timestamp, filters noise, and calculates rolling sums to show key market statistics. Users can visualize trade data through charts, with dynamic audio alerts based on trade volume and size. Developed using Vue.js and WebSocket, it supports exchanges like Binance, Coinbase, and Kucoin, offering a powerful tool for traders to monitor and analyze market activity.
